sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_b0c051de97220110be4abfb3f153afb0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_185616_flsh_crds_user_deck_history</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Tidy up histories</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var keep = [];
	var grKeep = new GlideRecord("x_185616_flsh_crds_user_deck_history");
	grKeep.addEncodedQuery("user="+current.user.sys_id.toString()+"^deck="+current.deck.sys_id.toString());
	grKeep.orderByDesc("sys_created_on");
	grKeep.setLimit(10);
	grKeep.query();
	while(grKeep.next()){
		keep.push(grKeep.getUniqueValue());
	}
	
	var grRemove = new GlideRecord("x_185616_flsh_crds_user_deck_history");
	grRemove.addEncodedQuery("user="+current.user.sys_id.toString()+"^deck="+current.deck.sys_id.toString()+"^sys_idNOT IN"+keep);
	grRemove.query();
	grRemove.deleteMultiple();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-01 08:07:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b0c051de97220110be4abfb3f153afb0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Tidy up histories</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Flash Cards" source="x_185616_flsh_crds">80c003a997220110be4abfb3f153af89</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Flash Cards">80c003a997220110be4abfb3f153af89</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b0c051de97220110be4abfb3f153afb0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-01 08:07:12</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b0c051de97220110be4abfb3f153afb0"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_1457e11a97a20110be4abfb3f153afba
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Flash Card Deck">c3d41dd297620110be4abfb3f153af7a</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Get Data from Deck to Copy or Edit</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   var deckId = getParmVal('sysparm_deck_id');
	
	if(deckId==null){
		return ;
	}
   var ga = new GlideAjax("FlashCardAjax");
	ga.addParam("sysparm_name","getDeckDataForRecordProducer");
	ga.addParam("sysparm_deck_id",deckId);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(setFormValues);
}

function setFormValues(answer){
	
	var action = getParmVal('sysparm_action');
	var fields = JSON.parse(answer);
	if(fields.name){
		g_form.setValue("name",fields.name);
		g_form.setValue("copy_or_edit",action);
		g_form.setValue("short_description",fields.short_description);
		g_form.setValue("category",fields.category.id,fields.category.name);
		g_form.setValue("flash_cards",JSON.stringify(fields.flash_cards));
	} else {
		alert("answer was empty");
	}
}

function getParmVal(name){
    name = name.replace(/[[]/, "\\[").replace(/[\]]/, "\\]");
	var regexS = "[\\?&]" + name + "=([^&#]*)";
	var regex = new RegExp(regexS);
	var results = regex.exec(top.location);
	if (results == null) {
		return null;
	} else {
		return unescape(results[1]);
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-01 10:21:46</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1457e11a97a20110be4abfb3f153afba</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Data from Deck to Copy or Edit</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Flash Cards" source="x_185616_flsh_crds">80c003a997220110be4abfb3f153af89</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Flash Cards">80c003a997220110be4abfb3f153af89</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1457e11a97a20110be4abfb3f153afba</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-01 10:54:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

FlashCardAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    type: 'FlashCardAjax',
	
	getDeckDataForRecordProducer: function(){
		var deckId = this.getParameter("sysparm_deck_id");
		return new FlashCardUtils().getDeckDataForRecordProducer(deckId);
	}
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-01 10:25:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>cbd17d9297e20110be4abfb3f153af87</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FlashCardAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Flash Cards" source="x_185616_flsh_crds">80c003a997220110be4abfb3f153af89</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Flash Cards">80c003a997220110be4abfb3f153af89</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_cbd17d9297e20110be4abfb3f153af87</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-01 10:48:29</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_95ce47a197a20110be4abfb3f153af1e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_185616_flsh_crds.FlashCardUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Utility functions to support the Flash Card Application</description><name>FlashCardUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var FlashCardUtils = Class.create();
FlashCardUtils.prototype = {
	initialize: function () {
	},

	/**
	 * @description Copy a deck, it's flashcards and all the flashcards answers
	 * @param {Glide Record} deck [x_185616_flsh_crds_deck]
	 * @returns sys_id of new deck record 
	 */
	copyDeckAndFlashCardsAndAnswers: function (deck) {
		//create new deck
		var deckName = deck.getDisplayValue();
		var deckId = deck.getUniqueValue();
		deck.name = "Copy of " + deck.name;
		var newDeck = deck.insert();
		gs.addInfoMessage("Deck " + deckName + " copied");

		//create new flash cards
		var fc = new GlideRecord("x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card");
		fc.addEncodedQuery("deck=" + deckId);
		fc.query();
		while (fc.next()) {
			fc.getUniqueValue();
			this.copyFlashCard(fc, newDeck);
		}

		return newDeck;
	},

	/**
	 * @description Copy a flashcard relate to a deck
	 * @param {Glide Record} fc [x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card] the record to copy
	 * @param {string} Optional deck sys_id of a record in [x_185616_flsh_crds_deck] to relate the new flash card to. If omitted deck is carried over.
	 * @returns sys_id of new flash card record 
	 */
	copyFlashCard: function (fc, deck) {
		fc.deck = deck || fc.getValue("deck");
		var fcName = fc.getDisplayValue();
		var newFc = fc.insert();
		gs.addInfoMessage("Flash Card " + fcName + " copied");
		return newFc;
	},

	/**
	 * @description get the ids of the user criteria records related the deck
	 * @param {string} deckId deck sys_id of a record in [x_185616_flsh_crds_deck]
	 * @returns an array of user_criteria sys_ids
	 */
	getDeckAvailableFor: function (deckId) {
		var arr = [];
		var uc = new GlideRecord("x_185616_flsh_crds_m2m_user_criteri_decks");
		uc.addEncodedQuery("user_criteria.active=true^deck=" + deckId);
		uc.query();
		while (uc.next()) {
			arr.push(uc.user_criteria.sys_id.toString());
		}
		return arr;
	},

	/**
	 * @description get the ids of the user criteria records related the flash card
	 * @param {string} fcId sys_id of a record in [x_185616_flsh_crds_m2m_user_criteri_flash_cards]
	 * @returns an array of user_criteria sys_ids
	 */
	getFlashCardAvailableFor: function (fcId) {
		var arr = [];
		var uc = new GlideRecord("x_185616_flsh_crds_m2m_user_criteri_flash_cards");
		uc.addEncodedQuery("user_criteria.active=true^flash_card=" + fcId);
		uc.query();
		while (uc.next()) {
			arr.push(uc.user_criteria.sys_id.toString());
		}
		return arr;
	},

	/**
	 * @description create a new record in [x_185616_flsh_crds_user_deck_history]
	 * @param {string} userId sys_id of sys_user
	 * @param {string} deckId deck sys_id of a record in [x_185616_flsh_crds_deck]
	 * @param {json string} config json formatted like data.flash_card_deck in the flash-card-deck widget
	 * @Returns sys_id of new record [x_185616_flsh_crds_user_deck_history]
	 */
	createUserDeckHistoryRecord: function (userId, deckId, config) {
		var udh = new GlideRecord("x_185616_flsh_crds_user_deck_history");
		udh.initialize();
		udh.user = userId;
		udh.deck = deckId;
		udh.json = config;
		return udh.insert();
	},

	/**
	 * @description get the json from a user deck history record
	 * @param {string} id sys_id of [x_185616_flsh_crds_user_deck_history]
	 * @returns {object} the parsed object from the json field on the specified record
	 */
	getUserDeckHistoryRecordJson: function (id) {
		var obj;
		var gr = new GlideRecord("x_185616_flsh_crds_user_deck_history");
		gr.get(id);
		if (gr.isValidRecord()) {
			obj = JSON.parse(gr.json.toString());
		}
		return obj;
	},

	/**
	 * @description get an array of available flash cards having checked available for user criteria
	 * @param {string} deckId deck sys_id of a record in [x_185616_flsh_crds_deck]
	 */
	getAvailableForFlashCards: function (deckId) {
		var arr = [];
		var fcs = new GlideRecord("x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card");
		fcs.addEncodedQuery("active=true^deck=" + deckId);
		fcs.orderBy("order");
		fcs.query();
		while (fcs.next()) {
			var fc = {};
			fc.question = fcs.question.getHTMLValue();
			fc.name = fcs.getDisplayValue();
			fc.answer = fcs.answer.getHTMLValue();
			fc.selected = false;
			fc.user_answer = "";
			//check user criteria
			var fcu = new x_185616_flsh_crds.FlashCardUtils();
			var availableFor = fcu.getFlashCardAvailableFor(fcs.getUniqueValue());
			if (availableFor.length > 0) {
				availableFor = availableFor.filter(function (ucid) {
					return new global.UserCriteriaUtil(ucid).check();
				});
				if (availableFor.length > 0) {
					arr.push(fc);
				}
			}
			else {
				arr.push(fc);
			}
		}
		return arr;
	},

	/**
	 * @description get a json string with properties to pre fill the fields on the deck record producer
	 * @param {string} deckId deck sys_id of a record in [x_185616_flsh_crds_deck]
	 * @returns JSON string
	 */
	getDeckDataForRecordProducer: function(deckId){
		var obj = {};
		var deck = new GlideRecord("x_185616_flsh_crds_deck");
		deck.get(deckId);
		if(deck.isValidRecord()){
			obj.name = deck.getDisplayValue();
			obj.short_description = deck.short_description.toString();
			obj.category = {};
			obj.category.id = deck.getValue("category");
			obj.category.name = deck.getDisplayValue("category");
			obj.flash_cards = this.getAvailableForFlashCards(deckId);
			obj.flash_cards = obj.flash_cards.map(function(card){
				var newCard = {};
				newCard.question = card.question;
				newCard.answer = card.answer;
				return newCard;
			});
		}
		return JSON.stringify(obj);
	},

	type: 'FlashCardUtils'
